items.creator: This Week in DAOS
items.title: This Week in DAOs #000
items.dc:creator: This Week in DAOS
items.content:
Alexander is the co-founder of Creaton. Alexander talks web3 social, the future of DAOs, and how DAOs will emerge to change the society.
Follow Alexander on Twitter (@Aer0xander)
Follow Shun on Twitter (@shunkakinoki)

‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒

Links from the show:

Check out Alexander: https://twitter.com/Aer0xander
Creaton: https://creaton.io
Superfluid: https://superfluid.finance

‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒

Follow This Week in DAOs on Twitter at @TWiDAOs

feed.creator: This Week in DAOS
feed.title: This Week In DAOs
feed.description: We interview the cutting edge founders, investors and innovators in the emerging world of DAOs. Get an insider’s look into DAOs, learn how to start and join your favorite DAOs, and take a look into how DAOs have the potential to change our society as we know it and beyond.
feed.author: This Week in DAOS
